
Subject: Your shared hosting account expires today

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your shared hosting account expires today, on the:

%%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on the my-account tab, and
renew it.

We will keep your hosting account up few days to give you the time to
renew your contract. After the grace period your account will be
deleted.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
